title: User query: Plan description from client LLM
log: Calculate the revenue loss for small-quantity orders for parts of brand ‘Brand#23’ and container type ‘MED BOX’ during the year 1996. A small order is defined as a lineitem whose quantity is less than 20% of the average quantity for that part. Compute the total gross (undiscounted) revenue of these small orders for the year 1996 and output the result in a textfile.

operations.udf: (t: (((Int, Double, Double), Int), (Int, Double))) => { val line = t._1._1; val qty = line._2; val avg = t._2._2; qty < 0.2 * avg }

log.thoughts: Filtered lineitems to 1996, computed per-part average quantity, filtered parts by brand and container, joined datasets, selected lineitems with quantity < 20% of part average, summed extended prices and wrote result to a text file.

title: Class: PlanMapper Mapped plan finalized for execution

data.table: (SELECT l_orderkey, l_partkey, l_suppkey, l_linenumber, l_quantity, l_extendedprice, l_discount, l_tax, l_returnflag, l_linestatus, l_shipdate, l_commitdate, l_receiptdate, l_shipinstruct, l_shipmode, l_comment FROM lineitem) as X
(SELECT p_partkey, p_name, p_mfgr, p_brand, p_type, p_size, p_container, p_retailprice, p_comment FROM part) as X

data.udf: (t: (((Int, Double, Double), Int), (Int, Double))) => { val line = t._1._1; val qty = line._2; val avg = t._2._2; qty < 0.2 * avg }

title: Err: PlanValidator Val error. Failed validation

errors: Operation id 12: Input id 13 ≥ operation id. Input ids must be smaller than operation id

title: Agent Usage: DebuggerAgent. Debug version 2 information

log.thoughts: Fixed: operator 6's output was referencing a non-existent op id 13 and op 12 referenced input 13 (>12). Changed operator 6 output to point to op 12 and updated op 12 inputs to reference operator 6 (id 6). This ensures all input ids are smaller than their operation ids and restores correct data flow.

operations.udf: (t: (((Int, Double, Double), Int), (Int, Double))) => { val line = t._1._1; val qty = line._2; val avg = t._2._2; qty < 0.2 * avg }

plan.thoughts: Fixed: operator 6's output was referencing a non-existent op id 13 and op 12 referenced input 13 (>12). Changed operator 6 output to point to op 12 and updated op 12 inputs to reference operator 6 (id 6). This ensures all input ids are smaller than their operation ids and restores correct data flow.

(SELECT p_partkey, p_name, p_mfgr, p_brand, p_type, p_size, p_container, p_retailprice, p_comment FROM part) as X
